author: Wayne Ma
title: Delta, Zara and Medtronic Join Marriott in Beijing’s Doghouse After Location Gaffes
text:
More foreign companies came into Beijing’s cross hairs Friday for including regions such as Tibet and Taiwan in a list of independent countries on their Chinese websites, a day after authorities ordered hotel giant Marriott International Inc. to suspend its online operations in the country for a similar offense. 

Delta Air Lines Inc., the Zara apparel chain and Irish medical-equipment maker Medtronic PLC all came under fire. The Civil Aviation Administration of China said it had met with a Delta representative to demand a...
